title: Christmas Scuttle
body: Hi, I was wondering when I would receive the christmas themed scuttler icon because I recently gifted someone when I saw the offer because that dang scuttler is so darn cute! I really want the icon and at least know when im getting it. Thanks BYE

replies.body: The Sowdown scuttler icon is really cute, and eligible players will get them!  Distribution for these are aimed to be sent by the 23rd of January.  Hang on until then!
